title: Android iphone app xrdp client
desc: The main target is to have remote desktop of the raspberry PI display on smartphone android and iphone.Main functions:The app is a simple xrdp client which works as remote desktop via wifi. The app basically lets connecting to another wifi device which is running like access point wifi with a xrdp server already running (as stand alone not sharing any internet connection )After opening the APP which is a single page , the user will be prompted with a main screen (layout will be provided)The user can select from the WiFi menu to hook to the desired ssid  and will be prompted for a password. Once selected the ssid and password then a connect button will be operative and  clicking on it the remote desktop will be started pointing to a default static ip and with a default name and password. Then the remote desktop will start automatically  showing the remote screen. The screen shall stay on not dimming over time as when you are watching something.The app will just have few buttons to disconnect reconnect etc.There are already similar app on the playstore i can show example just need to customise simple one.

desc: I need a responsive website.  I would like it designed and built.  I am interested in developing a business directory website with a Mobile App. It will be a similar concept to [url removed, login to view] but with social features that will enable registered businesses and user to connect, share updates and exchange messages.Business owners will register an account using a valid email account. From their user account dashboard they will have the tools to create pages for their business or businesses, see updates from other businesses they are connected with, Inbox messages, search for other businesses and connect with them, view performance trends / analytics of their business pages and keywords, place adverts, view and edit account settings.Creating a business page(s) - similar to profile pages in other social networks with cover page, logo, business name, location, contact details, about information, product types, images and a searchable keyword such as: plumber, Capinter, contractor....The business name, location and keywords will be used to match search results. Adverts will be pay per click and per per impression. Adverts will be on the home and on search results.This is a draft specification. I am open to suggestions. This is the first phase of the project. Further development will follow using user feedbacks. I am interested in a developer that will work on this on a long term.

title: Design a New iPhone case
desc: I have an idea to create a new type of Iphone case that has both a heating and cooling option on the case. My market would be anyone who is either cold or hot, when at the beach or when it's chilly outside, just flip the switch and hold the phone either in your hands or close to your face. I would like to pair this case with an app to turn on and regulate the temperature of the case. I feel like this can be a huge product and it can be licensed to bigger iphone brands or taken independently to make massive profits. The fan/heating system within the case would be through small vents and it would be safe enough that the phone does not overheat. Additionally, the vents would be very small and hidden within the actual design of the case. Imagine a personalized iPhone case with small vents to provide cooling and/or heating.

desc: Required Node.js developers for   developing schools transportation system and also Native Apps for Android and IOSPlease find the requirements belowSuper Admin Sign up:•         User can access GPS Tracking Bus Management through login and password•         User can create, edit, and delete the profile of registered schools•         User can track and monitor the bus routes of the schools’ students for their pick ups and dropUp•         User will remain super admin of all the registered Schools for their GPRS Enabled Buses for schoolChildrenSchool Management:•         User can track all the buses location, speed, ignition etc in a single window•         User can generate various bus and route related reports in a printable format•         User can manage bus-driver-route-student allocation easily at the click of a button•         User can change route as per real traffic conditions, which can helpful to reroute the bus, ifRequiredBus Management:•         User as Admin can view the list of students who have boarded on the bus•         User can track Real time tracking of the bus movement using GPRS location on the app•         Bus driver gets a customized app login to input the data of children picked or droppedDigital Attendance App for Bus Attendant:•         Bus Attendant can mark route wise attendance for student for pick and drop route•         Attendance notification messages sent to parent as and when attendance is marked in the bus•         Track attendance history for each route and student in school dashboard•         Change bus allocated to any route instantly In case of last minute vehicle unavailabilityRoute Tracking Application for Parents:•         Real Time Live Bus tracking on the city map - Address, , direction ofMovement and much more•         Distance of bus stop from the bus and Estimated time of arrival of bus on the stop based on liveTraffic conditions on route between bus and parent's stop•         Parents can call the school bus staff directly through the App (Attendant/Conductor/TransportManager•         Notification messages for bus departure from school and arrival at the bus stops in afternoon
